animeDescription: Thousands of years ago, it was a time of witchcraft and dark magic. An evil sorceress has bewitched the emperor of the mighty dynasty and he has become a mindless puppet. The country is in shambles, and evil spirits lurk everywhere. The human world is on the verge of utter destruction. A bold mission is planned by the Confederation of the Immortal Masters. They send a young master wizard to hunt down the villains and evil warlocks in the devastated lands.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Yuuki, Hiro', 'Kakazu, Yumi', 'Miyata, Kouki', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Matsuyama, Takashi', 'Chiba, Susumu', 'Kusao, Takeshi', 'Yamagishi, Isao', 'Ogata, Megumi', 'Matsumoto, Rica']
